mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_ID, ISSUER_REFUNDID, RESULT_MSG, RESULT, HTTP_STATUS FROM TB_REFUND_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR (REG_DT, 'yyyymm') IN (#{current_month}, #{last_month}) AND REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REFUND_INFO ( REQUEST_ID, CLIENT_REFUNDID, ISSUER_PAYMENTID, AMOUNT, REFUND_REASON, MERCHANT_ID ) VALUES ( #{param.requestId}, #{param.clientRefundId}, #{param.issuerPaymentId}, #{param.refundAmount.amount}, #{param.refundReason}, #{param.merchantId} )
